author: The Polymath Universe

text:
If you didn't read the comic book: 



The cosmosmurf is building a space rocket in order to accomplish his long dream of visiting mars. Only the grandsmurf knows it won't work. The rocket can't really fly. So instead he have the whole village drug the cosmosmurf, disassemble the rocket and transport everything to a volcano crater. Then all the smurfs disguise themselves in martians and surprise him with "otherworldly" intelligent life, strange customs and gibberish language. Really sweet story.

author: James Kwong

text: Gonzalez said in an interview that he never learned about music, that he just composed songs until his ears felt they sounded right. It reminds me of myself since that's the way I am when I compose music, though I'm nowhere near as good as him. Vastly underrated composer, but definitely not in this list !

text: To me it's by far the best chiptune composer. All of his GB songs are amazing.
